token-factions.setting.tokenFactionsEnab: Generate token bases based on token disposition or actor folder color.

Standard use add texture to the token, need reload
token-factions.setting.draw-frames-by-de: Token frames (rings) are layered above token graphics. Enable this if you primarily use round tokens. Disable it if you primarily use irregularly-shaped tokens.
token-factions.setting.frame-style.name: Frame Render Style
token-factions.setting.frame-style.opt.b: Beveled (Must be developed from much more expert developer...)
Custom border (Must be developed from much more expert developer...)
token-factions.setting.frame-width.name: Frame Width (Percent of Grid Unit)
token-factions.setting.borderFactionsEna: SUBFEATURE - Enable the alternative token custom border
Alternative custom the border of the token, need reload
token-factions.setting.removeBorders.hin: Remove the border from specific tokens
token-factions.setting.permanentBorder.h: Permanently shows token borders unless directly hidden, selected tokens have double width borders
token-factions.setting.scaleBorder.name: Scale Borders
token-factions.setting.scaleBorder.hint: Scales token border according to the 'scale' token setting
token-factions.setting.borderWidth.name: Border Width
token-factions.setting.borderGridScale.h: Scale border width to grid size, based on 100px grid
token-factions.setting.borderOffset.name: Border Offset
token-factions.setting.hudEnable.name: Token Faction HUD element
token-factions.setting.hudEnable.hint: Add Token HUD element to disable/enable borderstoken faction

token-factions.setting.hudColumn.hint: Which HUD column to place the button in
token-factions.setting.hudTopBottom.name: HUD Top/Bottom
token-factions.setting.hudTopBottom.hint: Where to place the button in the column
token-factions.setting.plateFont.name: Nameplate Font
Attempts to keep nameplates the same size across different grid sizes

This will not work with 'Border Control' module active
